reviews: 2019 Blue Honda civic. A real workhorse that emphasizes reliability and performance over flash and frills. Navy blue four-door sedan. Available from $16000.
2014 Blue Honda HRV. Budget range SUV in blue. Focuses on trunk space and gas mileage over frills and speed.
2017 red Toyota RAV4. A compact SUV with a 2.5 litre 4-cylinder engine. Received awards for its fuel efficiency for an SUV.
2018 Red Subaru legacy. Midsize 4-door sedan. Emphasizes reliability and performance over fuel efficiency.
